title: Extraction & Purification of metals
question: 哪些金属能 Extraction through electrolysis / Pengekstrakan melalui elektrolisis
Impure metal / Logam tak tulen 要当成
Pure metal / Logam tulen 要当成
如果要提取纯铜，要用哪个当 electrolyte / elektrolit ?
A: Silver nitrate solution / Larutan argentum nitrat
B: Copper sulfate solution / Larutan kuprum sulfat
C: Zinc Chloride solution / Larutan zink klorida
D: Sodium hydroxide solution / Larutan natrium hidroksida
